name: Adequate Web Solutions
description:

We have served more than 70 clients from India and other countries around the world. We are providing innovative web solutions for every industry like Fashion, Engineering, IT, Education, Finance, Banking, Healthcare, BPO, and Enterprise.

•    Shopify Development,
•    .net Development

Our Objective:
- To provide the futuristic web & mobile solutions to start up to enterprise level business with contentment & competitive price.
